sources.title: Fighting Mad (1939) RENFREW OF THE FIGHTING MOUNTED
sources.description:
Stars: James Newill, Sally Blane, Benny Rubin
 Director: Sam Newfield

 Ann Fenwick is a witness to a bank robbery in the U.S. and the bandits, led by Trigger (Warner Richmond) and Leon (Ted Adams) capture her and when she disappears, a warrant is issued for her arrest as a material witness. The bank robbers flee across the border into Canda where they steal a trailer in which they lock Ann and the loot. The hitch breaks and the trailer plunges into a lake. Sergeant Renfrew (James Newill) and Constable Kelly (Dave O'Brien), of the Canadian Mounties,rescue Ann and she tells them she is a hitch-hiking tourist and gives a false name. Renfrew sends Kelly for aid, Ann escapes and Kelly returns with the news that she is wanted. The leader of the gang, Cardigan (Milburn Stone), sends the gang back for Ann and the loot, which Ann has hidden in a trappers cabin, just before Trigger recaptures her. Renfrew goes to her rescue, but is also captured. But reliable Constable Kelly is somewhere in the woods.

sources.title: Fighting Mad (1939) James Newill, Sally Blane, Benny Rubin | Action, Adventure Movie
sources.description:
Ann Fenwick is a witness to a bank robbery in the U.S. and the bandits, led by Trigger (Warner Richmond) and Leon (Ted Adams) capture her and when she disappears, a warrant is issued for her arrest as a material witness. 

Original title: Fighting Mad (1939) 

Colorized version https://youtu.be/aWn4NHH3Wn0

This film is available with subtitles in many language options.
Director: Sam Newfield
Writers: George Rosener  John Rathmell 
Stars: James Newill, Sally Blane, Benny Rubin 
Genres: Classics, Action, Adventure, Drama, Music

00:00 Full Movie
00:58 Renfew of the Royal Mounted and his companion travel to Canada, encountering theft and pursuit by the police.
10:15 A man named Benny seeks help after his car is stolen by thieves, and he encounters a law enforcement officer named Renfrew.
16:28 Benny encounters a criminal named Ann Fenwick, leading to a series of events involving theft, pursuit, and a confrontation with Renfrew of the Royal Mounted.
23:24 Renfrew receives a mission to find a missing girl and a stolen car, leading him to Frenchy's Lodge where he encounters suspicious individuals.
27:59 Adventure in the wilderness as Renfrew and his team search for a missing girl and stolen money, encountering suspicious characters along the way.
32:54 A young woman runs away and meets a police officer in the forest, seeking help to avoid an arranged marriage. The officer offers assistance and receives a new task.
36:54 Renfrew encounters a young woman connected to a bank robbery, but she is not the thief. Instead, her father is involved. Renfrew and his colleague, Benny, navigate through a series of events involving a rescue mission and a phone call to the police station.
43:41 Renfew of the Royal Mounted is involved in a high-stakes situation involving a missing sum of money, a hotel owner, and a potential threat to his life.
48:15 Conrad confronts Renfrew and Benny over stolen money, leading to a tense standoff.


@CultCinemaClassics .
Members-only videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: Ann Fenwick is a witness to a bank robbery in the U.S. and the bandits, led by Trigger (Warner Richmond) and Leon (Ted Adams) capture her and when she disappears, a warrant is issued for her arrest as a material witness. The bank robbers flee across the border into Canda where they steal a trailer in which they lock Ann and the loot. The hitch breaks and the trailer plunges into a lake. Sergeant Renfrew (James Newill) and Constable Kelly (Dave O'Brien), of the Canadian Mounties,rescue Ann and she tells them she is a hitch-hiking tourist and gives a false name. Renfrew sends Kelly for aid, Ann escapes and Kelly returns with the news that she is wanted. The leader of the gang, Cardigan (Milburn Stone), sends the gang back for Ann and the loot, which Ann has hidden in a trappers cabin, just before Trigger recaptures her. Renfrew goes to her rescue, but is also captured. But reliable Constable Kelly is somewhere in the woods.
